content: jeg får se tiny gilded christmas jumper by fabel knitwear tiny gilded christmas jumper by fabel knitwear fabel knitwear needles 3 5 mm yarn two strands fabel knitwear athena or a single strand dk weight yarn such as fabel knitwear elder or geillis tweed gilded metallic yarn something like fraya shiny gull from stoff og stil size one size quantity dk weight main yarn 15 grams quantity gilded yarn approximately 1 meter gauge 18 st s = 10 cm a festive knit christmas ornament perfect for your scrap yarn knit one for each family member and embroider their initials on in a festive gilded metallic yarn it is knit top down using magic loop the perfect festive gift abbreviations k knit p purl rs right side ws wrong side st s stitches sm stitchmarker bor beginning of round k2tog knit 2 stitches together as one jumper start by casting on 12 st s on 3 5 mm needles use circulars and magic loop work ribbed k1 p1 for 3 rounds change to stockinette and increase 8 st s evenly = 20 st s place out 4 sms 1 at the bor then after 3 st s 7 st s and 3 st s this means you have 3 st s per sleeve and 7 on the front and back separately raglan increases are now worked for the sleeved work until 1 st s before the first mm increase 1 k1 move sm to right needle increase 1 work until the second sm increase 1 move sm k1 increase 1 repeat for the second sleeve the next round is worked in stockinette with no increases repeat these two steps one round with raglan and one without for 8 rounds = 4 rounds with raglan and 4 rounds without you now have 52 st s in total put each of the sleeves on scrap yarn for later cast on 3 st s on each side of the body under the sleeves and work in the round until the body measured 2 5 cm from the armpits work ribbed k1 p1 for 1 cm and cast off put the first sleeve back on the needles and pick up 3 st s under the sleeve work 1 cm stockinette decrease 1 st s under the sleeve by working k2tog work 1 cm stockinette decrease 1 st s under the sleeve by working k2tog work until the sleeve measures 3 5 cm from the armpit knit 1 cm ribbed k1 p1 and cast off repeat for the second sleeve embroidered initial and loop the initials are embroidered using chain stitch in a gilded metallic yarn i ve freestyled the letters but if you search chain stitch letters embroidery monogram or other searches along those lines you ll find great fonts to copy
